Welcome to our eBook app! Your privacy and security are our top priorities This document outlines our policies regarding the collection, use, and protection of your personal information. 

Data Collection
We collect the following types of information to provide and improve our services:
Personal Information: When you register, we collect information such as your name, email address, and password.
Usage Data: We collect data about how you use the app, including the books you read, search queries, and interactions within the app.
Device Information: We collect information about the device you use to access the app, such as the device model, operating system, and IP address.

Data Use
We use your data to:
Provide and maintain our services.
Personalize your experience and recommend content.
Improve our app based on user feedback and usage patterns.
Communicate with you about updates, promotions, and news related to the app.

Data Protection
We implement a variety of security measures to ensure the safety of your personal information:
Encryption: All sensitive information is transmitted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology and encrypted in our database.
Access Control: Only authorized personnel have access to personal information, and they are required to keep the information confidential.
Regular Audits: We regularly review our security practices to keep up with emerging threats and ensure the highest level of protection.

User Control
You have control over your personal information:
Account Settings: You can update your personal information and change your password at any time through the account settings.
Data Deletion: You can request the deletion of your account and personal data by contacting our support team.

Cookies and Tracking
Our app uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience:
Cookies: Small files stored on your device that help us remember your preferences and usage patterns.
Analytics: We use third-party analytics tools to understand how our app is used and to improve its functionality.

Third-Party Services
We may share your information with third-party services for specific purposes, such as payment processing and analytics. These services are required to adhere to our data protection standards.

Changes to This Policy
We may update our security and privacy policies from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our app and informing you via email or in-app notifications.

Contact Us
If you have any questions or concerns about our security and privacy practices, please contact us at:

Email: lucidpublication@gmail.com 
Contact: +91-9621176465
Address: Lucid Ocean Pvt Ltd Behind BMW Speed Motorwagen, Chinhat Lucknow-226028 Uttar Pradesh,India

Thank you for trusting our eBook app. We are committed to protecting your personal information and providing a secure and enjoyable reading experience.
